p.codeblock: virtual int preload(int64_t songCode, const char* jsonOption) __deprecated = 0;
public abstract int preload(long songCode, String jsonOption)

dlentry.dd: This method is deprecated. Please use the method instead.
This method is deprecated. Use instead.

section.p: You can call this method to preload music resources you want to play. After this method is successfully called, the SDK triggers the callback to report preload events. Before calling this method, you need to call getMusicCollectionWithMusicChartId or to obtain the target music resource and get the song code songCode from the callback.

After a successful call, the SDK triggers the callback to report preload events. Before calling this method, you need to call getMusicCollectionByMusicChartId or searchMusic to obtain music resources and get the resource identifier (songCode) from the callback.
section.note: Before destroying the object, make sure to call the method only after receiving the callback.
Before destroying the object, make sure to call the method after receiving the callback.

plentry.pd: The song code used to identify the music resource.

Extended JSON field. Agora charges based on the application scenario you pass in the sceneType field. Different scenarios have different billing standards:
1: Live streaming scenario: Online karaoke room and background music playback.
2: Live streaming scenario: Background music playback.
3: (Default) Voice chat scenario: Online karaoke room.
4: Voice chat scenario: Background music playback.
5: VR scenario: Online karaoke room and background music playback. If you need to switch to another scenario, call this method again and pass the new sceneType value in this field.Example: {"sceneType":1}.
The identifier of the music resource.

Extended JSON field. Agora charges based on the sceneType you set in this field. Different scenes have different billing standards. See the billing documentation.
1: Live scene: Online karaoke room and background music playback.
2: Live scene: Background music playback.
3: (Default) Voice chat scene: Online karaoke room.
4: Voice chat scene: Background music playback.
5: VR scene: Online karaoke room and background music playback. If you need to switch to another scene, you must call this method again and pass a new sceneType value in this field.Example: {"sceneType":1}.
